oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-07-18 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 18, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performer Eddy Arnold with Harold Bradley on guitar and Marvin Hughes on piano (as per Mr. Bradley 2006-08-14), and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1032nd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Archie Campbell; Eddy Arnold; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- I Hear You Talkin' (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Grant Turner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Faron Young) -- Faron Young and Grant Turner introduce Eddy Arnold -- Tennessee Stud (Eddy Arnold) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Stony Point (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Faron Young talks -- I Know Who Holds Tomorrow (Faron Young) -- Grant Turner introduces Chet Atkins -- Tiger Rag (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
